string.text: Ah, stalker, what do you need?
What do you need? I still have more data to collect. Let's go find some more mutants.
Well done, stalker, here is the payment I promised. Come see me again some time; as I might have more work for you.
Hello, stalker. What brings you here?
What do you know about the Brain Scorcher?
Nigga, it's the coolest place on Erf!
Nigga, I'll make you a psi helmet for some dough! Or I'll make an even better one for even more DOUGH!
The more simple device is suitable enough for me. How much?
I don't want to take any chances. What do I need to do for the better quality device?
I will take no less then 10,000 Rubbles. The electronic components I need are very scarce and expensive here in the Zone.
12,500 Rubbles - no less. But this will require time as I only have a prototype.
You're in the wrong place, buddy! And you better leave before we make it the wrong time, too.
You looking for trouble or something? Get out of here before you find it!
Get lost, buddy. Do that, and we'll keep it peaceful.
